name: DirtyCity
description:
Completelly playable version of Ciudad Sucia, trying to emulate the look and feel of retro arcade games

In this game you should avoid all kind of objects by moving, jumping and croutching, in order to reach your date.

Use WASD to play or VISUAL CONTROLS if you are running it in a mobile device.

To start game INSERT COINS by clicking on the label CREDITS on the down right corner.
